snippet: Dr. Cheryl Karcher, 56, was accused of writing fake prescriptions for painkillers, using the names of her patients and keeping the pills for her own benefit.
abstract: Cheryl Karcher, Manhattan dermatologist often quoted in magazines and on television, is arrested at her Park Avenue office on charges that she wrote fake prescriptions for painkillers and kept the pills for her own benefit; pleads not guilty to multiple charges.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Cheryl Karcher, 56, was accused of writing fake prescriptions for painkillers, using the names of her patients and keeping the pills for her own benefit.

headline.seo: Dr. Cheryl Karcher Is Arrested in Drug Scheme
headline.main: Prescription Fraud Charges for Prominent Manhattan Dermatologist
headline.print_headline: Prescription Fraud Charges for Prominent Dermatologist
